general: You shine brighter than my eternal flames.
If I had tear ducts, I'd cry at your beauty.
Your intellect must be arcane in origin.
You're like a +3 weaponâ€”rare, powerful, and highly sought after.
The world is a grave, but you're still blooming.

37935747193372672: You're very opinionated, and I think that's a good thing! I don't have opinions so I look up to you.
You dress the best out of everyone here! I appreciate your attention to fine fabrics.
You are one of my few friends, and I choose them carefully!
I think you are very good looking!
Your family has a lot of money! That's a compliment... right?
You, uh... Oh! You are very nice to orphans, according to Droo!
You're very good at telling people what they want to hear!
Your father would be devastated by who you are. That's a good thing!
421372387892920320: You're my best friend in the world! Hooray!
I really like all of your hats and am jealous that I can't wear them.
I love spending time with you!
You're the best mentor a floating head could ask for!!
I really like that you keep cheese in your hat! I wish I could ask for some!!
Your positive attitude makes you a gem. Like my eyes!
Everything about you is friend shaped, Droo!
You are very fun to be around! I like when we play games!
You're small and I like that! We can be small together!
You're so smart, Droo. Like, super smart!
Mandrasanth was right to pick you to have his favor!
415917911366959122: Your multi-colored scales are very pretty!
I like that you're a very practical person.
Your taste in bugs is well refined! I've never tasted a bug... but I can appreciate when someone is particular!
I think your Sea Monster must be a nice guy because you're nice, and nice people hang out together!
You've got a lot of smarts! I'd ask you to share but that would make my compliment less impactful.
I like the way you watch people! Like you really want to understand them.
You have.... very long nails! They're nice!
You're my favorite grandma! I don't remember mine... but that still counts as a compliment!
Your Sea Monster did a good job choosing you!
210171206492618752: You're very good with a crossbow! I would know...
You have the nicest beard in the group! It makes me miss my beard!
I think your dad would be proud of you, Al.
I think you'd wrangle cows really good!
You're a really great song writer! It makes me want to move my non-existent body!
I enjoy when you play your guitar! It's very soothing!
You have a strong moral compass! I appreciate that.
You have good taste in leather! Very high quality.
You're really good at arguing with Oliver!
939196878766080021: You are so nice to animals! I like that about you.
Your desire for justice is admirable!
You're a very honest person. I like honest people! I don't have to worry if they're going to make me sign a scary contract.
You are so good at magic!
I like watching you transform into an animal! You're very good at it!
Your moonbeam is so strong! Zap zap!
You seem like you give really good hugs! I can't hug, but I'd bet you do!
You gave really good dating advice to Gilly! It seems like it really helped him!
You and Sully have a beautiful friendship!
I love that you free animals everywhere you go!
324278880829571073: You brought me to life!! What a treat!
You've made a beautiful game world.
Your storytelling skills are always getting better!
You're not part of this world! Why am I complimenting you?
